, their first meeting since Reed helped save Jones ' life in 2012 .

PAWTUCKET , R.I. - The 73 - year - old man with the smile and tanned face who got out of the Toyota pickup truck Monday morning in front of the Pawtucket fire station was nothing like the man firefighter David Reed had faced in the days just before Christmas 2012 .
He was off - duty at a Christmas concert at Emmanuel Episcopal Church in Newport when he heard a man gasping for breath .
He was off - duty at a Christmas concert at Emmanuel Episcopal Church in Newport when he heard a man gasping for breath .
Jerry Jones , of Texas , who was in Rhode Island visiting his son , was having a heart attack and collapsed .
